channel.title: Can you run a node server on particle?
channel.description:
hey all,
i'm trying to use carloop as an ODBII reader to monitor a vehicle being towed with its engine running. I'll skip the details on this, but trust me when I say there are very good reasons for this.
Some of the areas I tow the vehicle do not have cell service so none of the data coming from carhop can go through the cloud.
I'm trying to setup a local web server i can stream data from particle over my own local network.
Would love a pointer in the right direction. I saw this thread: https://carloop.dyndns.org/t/turn-your-carloop-into-a-remote-obd-ii-reader/93
But i'm not sure how to upload .html and .js files using the particle IDE
